sourcesContent:
import { Avatar, Box, TextField, Typography } from '@mui/material'
import React from 'react'
import { Context } from '../App'

const AddPost = () => {
  const { logger } = Context();
  return (
    <Box sx={{ border: "1px solid" }}>
      <Typography sx={{ fontSize: "25px", textAlign: "center", color: "green" }}> Create a post </Typography>
      <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'start', p: 4 }}>
        <Avatar sx={{ color: 'action.active', mr: 1, my: 0.5 }} >
          {logger.name.charAt(0)}
        </Avatar>
        <TextField label="Whats on Your Mind?" multiline rows={2} variant="standard" fullWidth />
      </Box>
      <Box sx={{dis}}>
        <input type={"file"} />
      </Box>
    </Box>
  )
}

export default AddPost
